tool_description: Analyzes historical supplier performance to determine lead time distributions, variability patterns, and reliability metrics for inventory planning.
error_messages: Data length mismatch: order_history and supplier_ids must have same length
Insufficient order history: Need at least 10 historical orders for analysis
Invalid lead times: All lead time values must be positive
Analysis period too short: Minimum 30 days required for meaningful analysis
usage: Provide order_history array with corresponding supplier_ids. Set analysis_period_days to focus on recent performance.

average_lead_time.description: Overall average lead time in days

lead_time_variability.description: Coefficient of variation for lead times

percentile_90.description: 90th percentile lead time for safety planning
